Hi

I am doing unit test(java). in my testcase class, I have assertTrue(..). When the condition is false, it suppose to throws exception. The problems is: when the condition is false, it just silently skip it, and continue to execute the next method. No error msg at all. This happens with other assertXXX methods. 

Does anyone know what's wrong? I appreciate your help.

Thank you very much

Nancy
